name: Angela Cox UX / UI designer
tagline: “It was amazing how many people spent their whole lives in places where they never intended to stay.” ― Terry Pratchett
body:
### About

I'm a UX designer specialising in usable interface, content strategy and IA. I love to create human-centred designs that surprise you with their simplicity.

Seven years experience as a software tech writer gives me a intuitive understanding of interface design such as error messaging, or the importance of leveraging small areas of real estate with big messages.

My psychology degree taught me efficient research design, but also taught me to how to build humanity into software. 

I enjoy a good story, but understand the importance of listening.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
